Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Smd1 (S. calcitrans defensin 1; defensins; UCSS1a; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrate, animals; 3S=S; JJsn)
Sequence Information.Source: mRNA in anterior midgut tissues, stable fly,Stomoxys calcitrans

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (55.32%) toDLP4pI 7.05.Host expression:constitutive: A certain level of Smd1 transcript is found in the midgut constitutively.Activity: The HPLC fraction gave no activity at 8 uM. In the assay with lysozyme, however, it gave activity equivalent to 2.5 uM cecropin B, implying mainly a synegistic effect on E. coli (synergy:AMPs).  Updated 6/2019
Literature Information.Author: Lehane MJ, Wu D, Lehane SM.1997
Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1997 Oct 14;94(21):11502-7.Pub-Med.
Literature Information.Title: Midgut-specific immune molecules are produced by the blood-sucking insect Stomoxys calcitrans.
